1374: Sophia was born in Koe straet in 1374.
1375: Lost mother at the age of 1.
Galo took care of Sophia since Sophia was 2.
1385: Lost father at the age of 11.
Became caretaker of Costan, Sarre at age 12.
1388: Lost sibling Sarre in 1388 when Sarre was 14.
Got married to Harlo at age 15 in 1388.
Had Harlo move in at Koe straet.B.0 after marriage.
1389: Gave birth to Machtilden in 1389 at age 15.
1390: Gave birth to Diewiven in 1390 at age 16.
Lost daughter Diewiven when Diewiven was 1 years old.
1393: Gave birth to Havix in 1393 at age 19.
1394: Gave birth to Rodolf in 1394 at age 20.
1395: Gave birth to Mabelie in 1395 at age 21.
1398: Gave birth to Pietersen in 1398 at age 24.
1399: Gave birth to Volcwiif in 1399 at age 25.
Lost daughter Mabelie when Mabelie was 5 years old.
